FIELD_DESC: Origin Airport, Airport ID. An identification number assigned by US DOT to identify a unique airport.  Use this field for airport analysis across a range of years because an airport can change its airport code and airport codes can be reused.

Destination Airport, Airport ID. An identification number assigned by US DOT to identify a unique airport.  Use this field for airport analysis across a range of years because an airport can change its airport code and airport codes can be reused.
